section.name: maven 2.X plugin settings
section.p: See tables of all properties for all goals below. The globalProperties and projectProperties overrides are specified with for example <projectProperties> <param>property=value</param> <param>anotherproperty=anothervalue</param> </projectProperties>

tr.td: Specified the name of the soapUI project file to use, default value is ${pom.artifactId}-soapui-project.xml
Specifies the name of the TestSuite to run
Specifies the name of the TestCase to run
Overrides the service endpoint to be invoked by any TestRequests
Overrides the target host:port to be invoked by any TestRequests
Overrides the username used by any TestRequests run
Sets the WSS Password type to use, must be either 'Text' or 'Digest'
Overrides the password used by any TestRequests run
Overrides the domain used by any TestRequests run
Controls if a small test report should be printed to the console (true/false)
Set which folder results/reports are saved to
Controls if all test requests should be exported (default only exports errors), (true/false)
Specifies soapUI settings file to use
Tells TestRunner to skip all tests, (true/false)
Tells TestRunner to not fail the build if there are failed tests, (true/false)
Password to use for encrypted project file
Password to use for encrypted settings file
soapUI Pro only : Opens generated HTML reports in browser, (true/false)
soapUI Pro only : Generate WSDL Coverage reports, (true/false)
Specified the name of the soapUI project file to use, default value is ${pom.artifactId}-soapui-project.xml
Specifies the name of the TestSuite to run
Specifies the name of the TestCase to run
Specifies the name of the LoadTest to run
Overrides the limit of executed LoadTests
Overrides the initial ThreadCount of the specified test(s)
Overrides the service endpoint to be invoked by any TestRequests
Overrides the target host:port to be invoked by any TestRequests
Overrides the username used by any TestRequests run
Overrides the password used by any TestRequests run
Sets the WSS Password type to use, must be either 'Text' or 'Digest'
Overrides the domain used by any TestRequests run
Controls if a small test report should be printed to the console (true/false)
Set which folder results/reports are saved to
Specifies soapUI settings file to use
Password to use for encrypted project file
Password to use for encrypted settings file
Specified the name of the soapUI project file to use, default value is ${pom.artifactId}-soapui-project.xml
Specifies the interface to generate for
Specifies the tool(s) to run, a comma-separated list of axis1, axis2, dotnet, gsoap, jaxb, wstools, wsconsume, ora, wscompile, wsi, wsimport, xfire or xmlbeans
Specifies soapUI settings file to use, will contain path to integrated tool to run
Specified the name of the soapUI project file to use, default value is ${pom.artifactId}-soapui-project.xml
The local port to listen on, overrides the port configured for the MockService
The local path to listen on, overrides the path configured for the MockService
Turns off blocking when MockRunner has started
Specifies soapUI settings file to use, will contain path to integrated tool to run
Password to use for encrypted project file
Password to use for encrypted settings file
